title: The CD Projekt Controversy Continues - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.16.20
description:
Blessing and Gary Whitta talk about Devotion getting delisted from GOG, Cyberpunk 2077 adjusting dildoes, and more.

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:40 - “I feel like we all tell ourselves the lie of a game we are going to go back and finish now that we have time. So what is your lie?” - Ray Briggs II
00:14:43 - Housekeeping
PSILY XOXO is recording this Friday and it’s the PSILY AWARDS so go over to Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames and write in with your picks for the Best Of in PlayStation in 2020.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: 
Black Jack
      -  The Roper Report   -
00:16:19 - GOG nixes re-release of horror game “Devotion”
00:35:29 - CD Projekt Is Adjusting Cyberpunk 2077's 'Distracting' Amount Of Dildos
00:41:46 - Cyberpunk Refund Update
00:43:52 -  Ads
00:48:30 - UK politicians call for action against PS5 and Xbox Series scalpers
00:55:21 - Fortnite adds 120 FPS support and an Among Us inspired mode
01:01:46 - You can play Stadia on your IPhone now!
01:04:16 - Out today 
01:05:29 - Squad Up: Jay - PS4/PS5 - Destiny 2 - JX-3
01:06:13 - You‘re Wrong
01:07:53 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
